author: Staff Reporter
text:
The budget session of the Puducherry Assembly will commence on March 10.

Vote on account

As the Model Code of Conduct (MCC) has come into force with the notification of Assembly elections, the session would adopt a vote on account for the first few months of the new fiscal through an interim budget.

Chief Minister N. Rangasamy who also holds the Finance portfolio will present the vote on account, according to official sources.

The Assembly has a total of 30 elected members with the ruling AINRC having 16 Legislators on its side.

On the Opposition side, the Congress has seven legislators while the AIADMK has five members and the DMK two members.
title: Budget session of Puducherry Assembly on March 10
